title: Pasta Salad in a Jar
ingredients: 1 (9 ounce) package spinach and cheese tortellini
¼ cup halved, seeded, and sliced English cucumber
¼ cup matchstick-sized pieces red onion
salt and ground black pepper to taste
instructions: 1. Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook tortellini in the boiling water until they float to the top, about 5 to 7 minutes. Drain water and place in the refrigerator to cool for about 15 minutes. 2. Layer pesto, cucumbers, tomatoes, onions, tortellini, and mache into the canning jar; season with salt and pepper.
